title: Strengthening AI Practical Competencies: Electronic Performance Support Systems for Enhancing Scientific Research Methods

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic research methodologies and statistical analysis concepts
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can apply the five stages of scientific research design (problem definition, literature review, methodology selection, data collection, result analysis) via EPSS.
Learners can write research proposals using online tools for systematic literature reviews and research ethics compliance.
Learners can correct over 80% of errors in research methodologies through the EPSS feedback system.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
